item.title: 「Big Brother Whale」 Huang Lizhong holds and longs PUMP with a total unrealized loss of over $5.4 million
item.description: On July 22nd, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng is currently holding a long position on PUMP on Hyperliquid, with a floating loss of 3.9 million US dollars. Nevertheless, he is still increasing his position to continue to hold a long position in PUMP.In addition, Huang Licheng has a floating loss of more than 1.5 million US dollars on PUMP spot.

item.title: Fogo Launches Public Testnet of High-Speed Layer1 SVM Chain, Supporting On-chain Transactions
item.description: On July 22nd, according to The Block, Layer1 blockchain project Fogo, which was established by former Wall Street executives, launched its public testnet on Tuesday. The initial contributors indicated that the architecture is designed to replicate the execution standards of traditional finance (TradFi) in a decentralized manner, offering real-time transaction execution and on-chain trading infrastructure that is suitable for institutional scale.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Past $119,000
item.description: On July 22nd, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin rebounded and broke through $119,000. It is currently trading at $119,004, with a 24-hour increase of 0.15%.

item.title: Goldman Sachs: Expects the Fed to Hold Rates Next Week, Will Cut Later on Slowing Job Market
item.description: July 22nd. According to Goldman Sachs, the Federal Reserve is predicted to maintain the interest rate unchanged next week and start cutting rates in the remaining three meetings of 2025. This is because the slowing job market is putting pressure on policymakers. The current private sector hiring has almost reached a "standstill pace," and there is a risk of further aggravating the slowdown. Meanwhile, consumer spending has been stagnant for six consecutive months, which is an extremely rare situation outside of an economic recession. Goldman Sachs also anticipates that the Fed will cut rates twice again in early 2026.

item.title: A Whale's 3x Leveraged Short Position on PENGU Liquidated, Resulting in a $13.16 Million Loss
item.description: On July 22nd, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a whale's position on Hyperliquid, where it was shorting PENGU with a 3x leverage by accessing Hyperliquid, was liquidated, leading to a loss of $13.16 million. Subsequently, the whale reestablished a small PENGU short position with a 2x leverage. As of the present moment, their total loss amounts to $10.6 million.

item.title: 经纬天地 is pleased to announce the launch of its in-house developed Global Stablecoin Currency Payment Platform
item.description: July 22nd. According to The Beijing News, WeCapital declared its entry into the cryptocurrency payment domain. On July 21, 2025, it launched its first mobile application named "Fopay", presenting a one-stop payment platform.Fopay is developed based on the concept of stablecoin encrypted payments. At present, it offers stablecoin custody and prepaid card payment functions by means of several licensed partners. The board of directors thinks that the launch of Fopay and the new business segment can assist the company in exploring more business opportunities and bring benefits to the overall shareholders.

item.title: The FBI Ends Investigation of Kraken Founder and Returns Seized Devices
item.description: July 22nd. According to market intelligence, the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) has completed its investigation of the Kraken founder and has returned the seized equipment.

item.title: Mercurity Fintech announced the initiation of a share repurchase plan of up to $10 million
item.description: On July 22nd, as per GlobeNewswire, Mercurity Fintech Holding Inc. declared the commencement of a share repurchase plan with a maximum value of $10 million. The purpose of this plan is to bolster confidence in its Solana and Bitcoin financial strategy and to increase shareholder value.

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Could Temporarily Dip to $115,000 to Test Support Level
item.description: On July 22nd, as per Cointelegraph, with Bitcoin surging to $122,000 and absorbing the majority of the obvious selling pressure, analyst AlphaBTC cautioned that the Bitcoin price might briefly drop to $115,000 to test the support level.The liquidity heatmap of Bitcoin indicates that the order book is prepared for this, with buy orders concentrated between $115,000 and $116,100.

item.title: Consensys is planning to lay off 49 employees, representing approximately 7% of its total workforce.
item.description: On July 22nd, as reported by Bloomberg, software firm Consensys, which was founded by Ethereum co-founder Joseph Lubin, is currently in the process of planning to lay off 49 employees, which accounts for around 7% of its total workforce.A spokesperson for the company stated that this restructuring is intended to enhance overall profitability. Consensys recently acquired a startup with approximately 30 employees, and these employees will remain with the company. Meanwhile, the company still intends to continue recruiting for other positions. Consensys's largest office location is in Brooklyn.
